summary: Maia, a unique vampire follower that combines the beauty of the Lunari race and the fierce and deadly combat style designed for her, with special spells and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#ff8c00][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]Version 1.1 Bugfix[/font][/b][/color][/size]

[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]This version fixes the name of the Sleeping Giant Inn that appeared in spanish instead of english.[/font][/size]

[size=4][color=#ff8c00][b][font=tahoma, geneva, sans-serif]Description[/font][/b][/color][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Maia, a unique vampire follower that combines the beauty of the Lunari race and the fierce and deadly combat style designed for her, with special spells and weapons.[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She is not another follower. She comes with Harkon's vampiric drain, the most powerful.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She can fight melee thanks to her Harkon's based Volkihard blade. Not only has the absorb health, magicka and stamina, also adds soul trap enchantment so if you provide her with a bunch of black soul gems, in no time you'll get them filled.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She has a reworked perk tree, including twin souls and light foot so you take her to stealth missions.[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She can summon a gargoyle but only when she has conjuration level 60 so she's not overpowered. Until she gets there I thought that an atronach was not much of a vampire style so I equipped her with a new spell created for her, "summon death Hound".[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She also is able to cast firebolts, thunderbolts and icy spears. When she levels up she can cast a frostcloack.[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]As a variant she is able to range combat with her daedric bow that comes with same special enchantment of her blade.[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She wears a red royal vampire armor with vampire boots and nightingale gauntlets, all enchanted with special regeneration spells.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Also wears a gargoyle like amulet with unique enchantments for elemental and magick resistance.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]And finally comes with an aetherial like crown, also with special enchantments.[/font][/size]
 
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]She levels with you up to level 100 but starts low at level 6 as you can get her right from the start in the Sleeping Giant.[/font][/size]
 

[size=4][color=#ff8c00][b][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Where to find her[/font][/b][/color][/size]

[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]In the Sleeping Giant in Riverwood[/font][/size]
 

[size=4][color=#ff8c00][b][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Requirements[/font][/b][/color][/size]

[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Dawnguard[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]You need to install The Lunari Race and all it's requirements.[/font][/size]
 

[size=4][color=#ff8c00][b][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Credits[/font][/b][/color][/size]

[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Seren4xx for her article that helped me to create this mod.[/font][/size]
[size=2][font=tahoma,geneva,sans-serif]Halofarm for the Royal Vampire Armor retexture.[/font][/size]
author: OverClocked56
